page.title: 15FISHING INDUSTRY-DUNURE (1)
page.content: In last 40 years local fishing fleet has developed apace with modern industry.Boats have grown from light to heavy displacement hulls and engine power increased from 60/90 hp to 200/400 hp.Introduction of mechanical /hydraulic accessories made obsolete smaller boats and manual methods of fishing (lines/ring nets).Greatest changes are in fish finding equipment. Immediate post war fish finding depended on feeler wire hand held to determine fish density and nature of sea bed.Echo sounders and sonars now give accurate returns of location and density of shoals and nature of sea bed.Navigation has been revolutionised by Decca Navigator System.Gives positional accuracy to 40ft and radars a range of 60 miles.Previously naviga- tion was by alignment of shore marks.
